attributes.action: Force the FA to sack Steve McClaren and immediately appoint Jose Mourinho as England manager
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jose Mourinho is one of the greatest managers to have graced these shores, and despite his Portuguese nationality every English football fan loves and respects him for his work at Chelsea.

While McClaren may have bought himself time as England boss with recent results, but the FA must bite the bullet and realise that while a world class manager is available they should do everything available to get him.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
